pages.text: Cameroceras (chambered horn) is a giant orthocone living during the Ordovician to Silurian periods. It inhabitied shallow seas and became very diverse during the Upper Ordovician but dropped after the Ordovician-Silurian extinction event. It may have been and ambush predator that lunged on prey and consumed them.
